news.content: Seminar talk at Marks and Sander Lab, Harvard Medical School: 'Fundamental Abilities and In-abilities of AI'. [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1exGMlduMuPkbr6r26nI6aZXamnR2inlh/view?usp=sharing).

I gave a talk on 'Understanding Fundamental Abilities of AI with synthetic experiments' at the Astro AI Lunch Seminar at Harvard Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics. [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lIfwwUl_cJo).
